title: Under load Panache Reactive exception "Detected use of the reactive session from a different Thread..."

labels.name: triage/needs-reproducer
labels.description: We are waiting for a reproducer.

body:
### Describe the bug

I have application that uses Panache Reactive. There are several layers of services with @WithSession\@WithTransaction on methods. All is ok, until the app sometimes switches to eventloop thread 1 under load. I don't know if it is my mistake or the expected behavior.

```
	09:30:29.173 [vert.x-eventloop-thread-1] ERROR com.example.helper.utils.interceptor.faillog.OnFailLogInterceptor - java.lang.IllegalStateException: HR000069: Detected use of the reactive Session from a different Thread than the one which was used to open the reactive Session - this suggests an invalid integration; original thread [28]: 'vert.x-eventloop-thread-1' current Thread [20]: 'vert.x-eventloop-thread-0' {}
org.hibernate.HibernateException: java.lang.IllegalStateException: HR000069: Detected use of the reactive Session from a different Thread than the one which was used to open the reactive Session - this suggests an invalid integration; original thread [28]: 'vert.x-eventloop-thread-1' current Thread [20]: 'vert.x-eventloop-thread-0'
```

### Expected behavior

No exception

### Actual behavior

Exception

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_
